channel.title: deep learning on Zelong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in deep learning on Zelong's Blog

item.title: Multi-domain Modeling in Ads
item.description: For ML-powered advertisement systems, when building a big model to serve all the different businesses and channels, it is really important to make your model aware of the distinction between different domains. Here we present two papers from Alibaba which solve the problem of multi-domain learning in the field of online ads.

item.title: Deploy PyTorch Model on AWS SageMaker: For Beginners
item.description: This is a tutorial for beginners trying to deploy their PyTorch models online and build a model inference service.

item.title: A Search Engine for Academic Computer VisionÂ Papers
item.description: We built a new search engine for papers published on ICCV and CVPR in recent years, which has been deployed on AWS and can be accessed via this link. Full code is available on our Github.

item.title: Evolvement of Recommendation System Algorithms
item.description: This blog covers introduction to common algorithms in recommendation systems including Collaborative Filtering, Factorization Machine, Wide&Deep and DeepFM.

item.title: A Survey on Rule Learning in Text Mining
item.description: A short review of some recent researches on logic reasoning.
